text: Sérgio Avelino Lopes (born 2 June 1983) is an Angolan handball player for Association Sportive d'Hammamet and the Angolan national team. He participated at the 2017 World Men's Handball Championship.2017 World Championship roster In 2017, he signed a one-year deal with Tunisian side Association Sportive d'Hammamet. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Angolan male handball players Category:African Games silver medalists for Angola Category:African Games medalists in handball Category:Competitors at the 2011 All-Africa Games Category:Competitors at the 2015 African Games
title: Sérgio Lopes (handballer)
